Order.OrderTextExpired: The trial version of the program has been expired. You must purchase the full version for further program using.
Order.OrderTextAEFSDRDecrypt: You're using the trial version of AEFSDR. Only first 512 bytes of the file have been decrypted. The rest of the file has been filled by zeros. You must purchase the full version of AEFSDR to decrypt the file completely.
Order.OrderTextPDFDecrypt: All restrictions have been removed. WARNING: due to trial version limitations, only first document pages (about 10%) have been written to output file. Please purchase the full version to decrypt the whole document.
Order.OrderTextPDFDecryptStd: All restrictions have been removed. WARNING: due to limitations of Standard Edition, only first document pages (about 10%) have been written to output file. Please upgrade to the Professional or Enterprise Edition to decrypt the whole document.
Order.OrderTextPWSEXTrial: You're using the trial version of PPA. The number of accounts you've selected exceeds the trial version limitations. You must purchase the full version to audit this number of accounts.
Order.OrderTextPWSEXLicense: The number of accounts you've selected exceeds the limitation of license you've purchased. You can upgrade your current PPA license to audit more accounts. If you click "Order full version" button right now, you'll be able to purchase any license of PPA with 40% discount.
Order.OrderTextEDPRAgents: The Agent is attempting to connect to the Server, but the connections limit for this EDPR license is exceeded. You must purchase the EDPR license which supports more connections. Press the "Order Full Version" button to purchase the corresponding license.

Order.OrderTextPDFStdLen: You're using the program edition that has some limitations in brute-force and dictionary attacks (on maximum password length and some additional options). You need to upgrade to Professional Edition to use the attack without limitations.
Order.OrderTextPDFStdRainbow: Sorry, "Use pre-computer hash tables" option is available in the Enterprise edition of program only, while you're using the Standard one.
Order.OrderTextPDFProRainbow: Sorry, "Use pre-computed hash tables" option is available in the Enterprise edition of program only, while you're using the Professional one. You can look to our another program - Elcomsoft Distributed Password Recovery. This program allows to use more than one computer to perform a Brute-Force attack. Use the power of all computers you have in your network to find a password! Right now we offer you Elcomsoft Distributed Password Recovery with 30% discount.
